#summary Plugin requirements

= Introduction =

LLVM toolchain plugin for Eclipse CDT has certain requirements that must be met.

= Details =

   * Eclipse CDT 7.1.0 or newer is recommended
   * Java 5 JRE or newer
   * LLVM with Clang (follow the instructions on http://clang.llvm.org/get_started.html)
   * llvm-gcc compiler
   * LD_LIBRARY_PATH system environment variable containing path to libstdc++ library
   * PATH system environment variable containing path to LLVM with Clang binaries
